Row.Text: Greetings, stranger! Some call me Roman Nose, but know that I am the untouchable warrior, Woqini of the Cheyenne.
This is impossible! My preparations were immaculate! How could this have happened?
Today, you have sown the seeds of your own destruction.
The Cheyenne are a proud people, but our strength is as much in our allies as it is in ourselves. Would you like to make a public Declaration of Friendship?

Your misdeeds are so obvious that it is perhaps redundant for me to warn the world about them, but it is crucial that I do so anyway. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Brace yourself! You have incurred the wrath of the Cheyenne, and we will win numerous coups over your men.
This land is not yours. Remove yourself before I do it for you.
Oh, you dare to meet me in person? State your business, then.
It is a pleasure to welcome you. Come join us around the fire!
Welcome back. What brings you here?
For what reason have you disturbed me today?
Your army has been doing a lot of posturing lately. Perhaps I should put their resolve to the test.
I am always interested in commerce. Make your offer.
I cannot deny your ability, but I urge you to keep in mind that I will be stronger next time.
Your goods have piqued my interest. Let us engage in trade.
There can be no reconciliation between us.
My people will be traveling through your land. I hope you are amenable to this.
You insult us. Try again.
I have been praying to the gods for assistance, but I am not too proud to ask for earthly help as well.
I do not take umbrage to the complaints of lesser men.
Why do you flinch from battle? There are still many great deeds to be done.
What a triumph! I thank you for your contribution to my soldiers' glory.
